content: Ok hopefully last porting question of the day: I don't know how to check this myself so I have to ask here. If I'm in lean 4 namespace Foo corresponding to lean 3 namespace foo, and foo/Foo are being correctly aligned, and I define lean 4 Bar which needs to be aligned to lean 3 baz then can I just #align baz Bar or do I need to #align foo.baz Foo.bar?
according to Mario you need #align foo.baz Foo.bar
Related to this -- if I mess up an #align and align something which doesn't exist then will a machine tell me this at some point during the PR process?
I don't think so, it only tells you if you #align something twice
